skills.label: Describe cloud principles and delivery mechanisms
items: Differentiate between on-premises it service models
Differentiate between subscription or pay-as-you-go versus upfront capex/opex funding model
Use cloud services to expand capacity (elasticity of the cloud), scalability, redundancy, and availability
Differentiate between cloud services that are configurable versus on-premises services that are customizable

skills.label: Describe cloud security requirements and policies
items: Describe how cloud services manage privacy, how compliance goals are met, how data is secured at rest or on-the-wire, and how data and operations transparency requirements are met

skills.label: Describe how a cloud service stays up to date and available
items: Describe the service/feature improvement process
Monitor service health, service maintenance, and future roadmap publishing
Identify guarantees, service level agreements (sla), and capping of liability of the cloud service provider

skills.label: Describe the different types of cloud services
items: Differentiate between types of cloud services and their characteristics, including infrastructure as a service (iaas), platform as a service (paas), and software as a service (saas)
Integrate the cloud with on-premises services in hybrid scenarios

skills.label: Identify the requirements and dependencies for using Office 365 and Microsoft Intune
items: Plan networking and domains, firewall rule, client requirements, bandwidth implications, and dns

skills.label: Select a cloud service plan
items: Understand the different options and plans available for office 365 and microsoft intune

skills.label: Sign up for cloud services
items: Name your tenant, set up your first administrator, determine tenant location

skills.label: Set up the initial configuration of cloud services
items: Register domains, verify domains, choose the domain purpose
Identify required dns record types

skills.label: Create users and groups, and assign services and licenses
items: Differentiate between cloud identities (online identity, synchronized identities, federated identities), create and manage users and identities, delete and restore users (soft delete), create and manage groups, assign and revoke licenses, determine user locations

skills.label: Assign permissions in Office 365 and Microsoft Intune
items: Assign or revoke administrative roles
Manage delegated admins
Manage password policies, subscriptions, and licenses

skills.label: Monitor service health in Office 365 and Microsoft Intune
items: Monitor the service health dashboard, subscribe to rss feeds, monitor the maintenance schedule, monitor the message center, log service support requests, configure alerts

label: Use and configure Microsoft cloud services (20–25%)

skills.label: Configure Exchange Online
items: Manage recipients (mailboxes, shared mailboxes, resources, contacts, groups), manage anti-spam and antivirus settings

skills.label: Configure SharePoint Online, including OneDrive
items: Create sharepoint team sites, configure external sharing, set up social features using newsfeeds or yammer, apply themes, set storage and resource limits

skills.label: Configure Skype for Business Online
items: Manage skype for business user options, manage external communication settings, configure dial-in settings and meeting invitation options, configure skype for business online dns

skills.label: Configure Microsoft Intune
items: Install microsoft intune client management software, create and deploy policies, automate installs, identify software requirements, set up notifications, identify mobile device management policies

skills.label: Resolve sign-in and Office application installation issues
items: Troubleshoot sign-in issues, forgotten passwords, connection problems, difficulty activating office applications, and difficulty connecting mobile devices to office 365 or microsoft intune
Choose between 32-bit and 64-bit
Identify when an office repair is required
Identify operating system requirements for office 365 proplus
Browser requirements and specific versions of internet explorer

skills.label: Resolve email and calendar issues
items: Troubleshoot issues receiving and sending email, troubleshoot issues accessing a delegated mailbox

skills.label: Resolve SharePoint and OneDrive issues
items: Identify storage limits, troubleshoot “open with explorer” not working and onedrive not syncing, recover deleted files

skills.label: Resolve Skype for Business issues
items: Troubleshoot skype for business sign-in issues, troubleshoot connection issues to skype for business online, troubleshoot communicating to skype consumer users and users in other companies using skype for business
